first-step-auction-sub-title: People send bids for things they want you to do
first-step-multiple-choice-sub-title: People pay to vote and you do the option with the most votes
first-step-crowdfunding-sub-title: People pool money together to back your goal

meta.title: Create a post on NewNew
meta.description: Create an Event, a Superpoll or a Goal on NewNew in a few simple clicks and earn money

meta.description-auction: Fans bid on your auctions and you earn cash
meta.description-multiple-choice: Make a paid poll, earn money and cash out on NewNew
meta.description-crowdfunding: Use crowdfunding campaigns to fund your life goals and earn money

targetBackerCount.description: ${{value}} is the minimum a backer can contribute

error.minLength: Video duration too small, choose from 10 seconds
error.maxLength: Video duration too long, choose up to 10 minutes
error.maxSize: Video size too big, choose up to 10gb

error.description: There was an error and your file could not be uploaded. Would you like to try again.

thumbnail.title: Set preview
thumbnail.description: Select a 3 sec snippet as decision cover. A good preview draws viewer's attention.

loading.title: Uploading video
loading.description: Your file is uploading. It won’t take long...

processing.title: You can still fill out the details below and publish your post while the video is being processed!

texts.subTitle-published: Expand your reach and share decision with others.
texts.subTitle-scheduled: Your decision scheduled on {{value}}. Expand your reach and share decision with others.

desktop.subTitle-published: Your decision is successfully created. Expand your reach and share decision with others.
desktop.subTitle-scheduled: Your decision is successfully created and scheduled on {{value}}. Expand your reach and share decision with others.

heroPopupAC.title: Events
heroPopupAC.line1:
1. Open to ideas? Post a video and have the
 audience send you bids on what you should do
heroPopupAC.line2:
2. People send bids with their ideas, and
 how much they’ll pay to see you do it
heroPopupAC.line3:
3. Choose your favorite bid, then
 upload a video of yourself doing it!

heroPopupMC.title: Superpolls
heroPopupMC.line1:
1. Post a video poll with a few options
 for the audience to choose from
heroPopupMC.line2: 2. People pay to vote on their favorite option
heroPopupMC.line3:
3. Upload a video response of you doing
 the option that gets the most votes!

heroPopupCF.title: Goals
heroPopupCF.line1:
1. Post a video goal and choose the number
 of backers you need to reach that goal
heroPopupCF.line2:
2. Every backer will contribute a custom
 dollar amount to your goal
heroPopupCF.line3:
3. Upload a video of you fulfilling your
 goal IRL when you get enough backers!
